projects.name: Obys Agency Clone
projects.description: The “Obeys Agency” clone is a visually striking, responsive website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enhanced by Locomotive Scroll for smooth scrolling, SheryJS for unique animations, Three.js for 3D visuals, and GSAP with ScrollTrigger for dynamic scroll-based effects, delivering an immersive, interactive user experience.
features: Immersive Animations – Smooth parallax and interactive motion powered by GSAP, ScrollTrigger, and SheryJS.
3D Visuals – Engaging, real-time 3D elements created with Three.js for a modern, premium feel.
Smooth Scrolling Experience – Locomotive Scroll integration for fluid, touch-friendly navigation across all devices.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: This is a fully responsive personal portfolio website built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features a dark/light theme toggle, allowing users to switch based on preference. The site includes my resume (view and download option), a showcase of my projects with live demo and source code links, a section for certificates, a display of skills, and links to my LeetCode and GitHub profiles. A contact form is integrated, which sends messages directly to my Gmail inbox, enabling seamless communication.
features: Dark/Light Theme Toggle – Seamless switching between dark and light modes for better user experience.
Fully Responsive Design – Optimized for all devices including mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Interactive Resume & Projects Section – View/download resume, explore projects with demo and source code links.

projects.name: NextHit: Movies Hub
projects.description: NextHit is a modern and responsive movie downloading website built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the frontend, with Google Apps Script powering backend automation. The platform displays movies through a dynamic grid, search functionality, and categorized sections like trending and genres. Apps Script fetches and updates movie data from Google Sheets, enabling easy management and automating download tracking and user feedback.
features: Dynamic Movie Listings: Interactive movie grid with search and category filters like Trending, New Releases, and Genres using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Serverless Backend: Google Apps Script fetches and manages movie data from Google Sheets without needing a traditional server or database.
Download Automation: Provides high-quality download links and automates user feedback and download tracking through Apps Script integration.

projects.name: Dribbble Clone
projects.description: Creating a Dribbble website clone using HTML and CSS involves replicating the visual structure and styling of the original Dribbble platform, focusing entirely on the frontend. This includes designing a responsive navigation bar with logo and menu links, a stylish hero section with a search bar and category filters, and a grid layout to showcase design shots with hover effects and interaction icons like likes and views. Using modern CSS techniques such as Flexbox, Grid, and media queries ensures the layout adapts to different screen sizes, closely mimicking the clean, professional look of Dribbble. This project helps improve UI design skills and deepens understanding of responsive web design using just HTML and CSS.
features: Responsive Design: Fully adapts to different screen sizes using Flexbox, Grid, and media queries for a mobile-friendly layout.
Interactive UI Elements: Includes hover effects on design shots, navigation links, and interactive icons like likes and views.
Modern Grid Showcase: Clean grid layout to display design thumbnails, closely resembling Dribbble's shot-style presentation.

projects.name: K72 Clone
projects.description: A bold, creativity-driven digital agency site from Montreal that builds brands from every angle. Its avant-garde style features smooth animations, bold typography, interactive hover effects, and expansive scroll-driven layouts that let the work shine.
features: Immersive Portfolio Showcase – Bold, avant-garde design with storytelling visuals to present their creative work in an engaging way.
Award-Winning Design & Technology – Recognized for exceptional UX, creativity, and innovation using advanced web technologies like GSAP animations, Lottie, and smooth scrolling.
Strategic Agency Identity – Clearly communicates K72’s full-spectrum agency services (strategy, branding, advertising, content) along with their culture and values.

projects.name: Premier Clone
projects.description: Creating a Premier website clone using HTML and CSS involves replicating the visual structure and styling of the original Premier platform, focusing entirely on the frontend. This includes designing a responsive navigation bar with logo and menu links, a stylish hero section with a search bar and category filters, and a grid layout to showcase design shots with hover effects and interaction icons like likes and views. Using modern CSS techniques such as Flexbox, Grid, and media queries ensures the layout adapts to different screen sizes, closely mimicking the clean, professional look of Premier. This project helps improve UI design skills and deepens understanding of responsive web design using just HTML and CSS.
features: Responsive Design: Fully adapts to different screen sizes using Flexbox, Grid, and media queries for a mobile-friendly layout.
Interactive UI Elements: Includes hover effects on design shots, navigation links, and interactive icons like likes and views.
Modern Grid Showcase: Clean grid layout to display design thumbnails, closely resembling Dribbble's shot-style presentation.

projects.name: Admin Ecommerce Store
projects.description: A modern e-commerce website built with React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and Toastify, featuring a sleek UI, fast performance, and real-time notifications. Includes a custom product management system where users can add, edit, and delete products, with a special product customization feature for a personalized shopping experience.
features: Custom Product Management System – Users can add, edit, and delete products seamlessly through an intuitive interface.
Product Customization Feature – Allows customers to personalize products for a unique shopping experience.
Real-Time Notifications – Instant updates and alerts using Toastify for actions like product changes or special offers.

projects.name: Advanced Calsi
projects.description: This is a modern, fully responsive calculator web application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It performs basic arithmetic operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, and percentage calculation. The UI features a sleek dark theme with neumorphic button design and a real-time input display. Keyboard support is also included for improved accessibility. Internally, the calculator separates display formatting (with Indian number formatting) from actual evaluation logic, ensuring accurate and user-friendly interaction.
features: Responsive & Mobile-Friendly Design: Automatically adapts to all screen sizes with no horizontal scroll, perfect spacing, and touch-friendly buttons.
Functional Arithmetic Operations: Supports all basic operations (add, subtract, multiply, divide, percentage) with real-time evaluation and keyboard support.
Clean Indian Number Formatting: Displays numbers in Indian digit grouping style (e.g. 1,00,000) for better readability, especially for local users.

projects.name: ChatBot
projects.description: This Chatbot project is an intelligent and interactive web-based application developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the frontend and Python for the backend. It enables real-time human-like conversations through a simple and responsive user interface. The frontend handles user input and displays responses dynamically, while the Python backend processes messages, generates meaningful replies, and manages the overall conversation flow. This chatbot can be easily integrated into websites for customer support, FAQs, or general interaction. It is lightweight, customizable, and designed to enhance user engagement by providing instant automated assistance with a smooth and modern UI experience.
features: Real-Time Interaction – Users can chat instantly with the bot through a clean and responsive web interface built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Python-Powered Intelligence – The backend, developed in Python, processes user queries, generates relevant responses, and ensures smooth two-way communication.
Customizable and Easy Integration – The chatbot can be easily modified and embedded into any website to handle FAQs, customer queries, or general assistance.

projects.name: Gmail Validator
projects.description: This project is a professional Gmail-only email verification web application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The interface is designed with a clean, modern, and responsive layout that adapts perfectly to all screen sizes — from large desktops to compact mobile devices. The application validates user input in real-time and ensures that only properly formatted Gmail addresses (ending with @gmail.com) are accepted. It performs detailed checks for common errors such as multiple '@' symbols, invalid characters, consecutive or trailing dots, missing parts, and spaces within the email. If the entered Gmail address passes all validation rules, a success message is displayed; otherwise, clear and user-friendly error messages guide the user to correct the input. This project demonstrates strong front-end design principles, precise JavaScript validation logic, and perfect responsiveness for a professional-grade web experience.
features: Advanced Gmail Validation – The system strictly validates emails to ensure they belong only to Gmail (@gmail.com) and follow all Gmail username rules such as no consecutive dots, no spaces, and only valid characters (letters, numbers, dots, underscores).

Real-Time Error Detection – As users enter their email, the website instantly checks for mistakes like multiple '@' symbols, missing text before or after '@', or invalid formatting, providing clear and easy-to-understand feedback messages.

Fully Responsive and Professional UI – Designed with a clean, modern layout using responsive CSS, the website automatically adjusts to fit all screen sizes — from large desktop monitors to smartphones — ensuring a seamless user experience everywhere.
